public class CamelRoutingEngine

addApplication

public final ConnectorService addApplication(String id,
                                             Connector connector)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                             ObjectAlreadyExistsException
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Adds an application with the specified id and Connector. The application is represented by a ConnectorService.

Specified by:
addApplication in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the application which must be unique and not null. Any white spaces will be removed and it will be lower cased.
connector - the Connector implementation.
Returns:
a ConnectorService implementation that represents the application. It is NOT started by default.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or empty, or if connector is null.
ObjectAlreadyExistsException - if an application with the same id already exists.

removeApplication

public final RoutingEngine removeApplication(String id)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                             ObjectNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Removes the application with the specified id. It calls the ConnectorService.destroy() method.

Specified by:
removeApplication in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the application to be removed.
Returns:
this routing engine instance.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the id is null or empty.
ObjectNotFoundException - if the id is not found.

getApplication

public final ConnectorService getApplication(String id)
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Retrieves the application that matches the specified id.

Specified by:
getApplication in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the application that is going to be retrieved.
Returns:
a ConnectorService implementation representing the application.

getApplications

public final List<ConnectorService> getApplications()
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Returns the list of applications ordered by priority in ascendent order.

Specified by:
getApplications in interface RoutingEngine
Returns:
a list of ConnectorService instances ordered by priority or an empty list if no application has been registered.

addConnection

public final ConnectorService addConnection(String id,
                                            Connector connector)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                            ObjectAlreadyExistsException
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Adds a connection with the specified id and Connector. The connection is represented by a ConnectorService.

Specified by:
addConnection in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the connection which must be unique and not null. Any white spaces will be removed and it will be lower cased.
connector - the Connector implementation.
Returns:
a ConnectorService implementation that represents the connection. It is NOT started by default.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if id is null or empty, or if connector is null.
ObjectAlreadyExistsException - if a connection with the same id already exists.

removeConnection

public final RoutingEngine removeConnection(String id)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                            ObjectNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Removes the connection with the specified id. It calls the ConnectorService.destroy() method.

Specified by:
removeConnection in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the connection to be removed.
Returns:
this routing engine instance.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the id is null or empty.
ObjectNotFoundException - if the id is not found.

Description copied from interface: RoutingEngine
Returns the list of connections ordered by priority in ascendent order.

Specified by:
getConnection in interface RoutingEngine
Parameters:
id - the id of the connection that is going to be retrieved.
Returns:
a ConnectorService implementation representing the connection or null if not found.
